lines.text: That's a lot of dough, so don't fall in the bay.
Don't worry. It's as safe as it was in a bank.
I see, and when he came on board for the dough, instead of giving him the jewels, you gave him hot lead.
And you can trust me. I'm what you call a straight shooter.

[Taking out a gun a killing him]
And so am I, brother!
